parameter.description: Sent if VForce Data has already been extracted
parameter.name: in_VForceData

parameter.description: Sent if VForce Data has not yet been extracted
parameter.name: in_OpportunityID
reason
parameter.expression: "Input must be either 18-digit Opportunity ID (provided as["|| $input.in_OpportunityID ||"]) or pre-extracted VForce Data (not set)"
